department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: 2 prefabricated aluminium footbridges to be acquired for Parks Canada
description: This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number Doc3773267617 dated December 13, 2022 with a closing of February 8, 2023 at 2pm EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on March 1st, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Parks Canada, is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of two prefabricated aluminum footbridges, including delivery in Saint-Mathieu-du-Parc, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada), as detailed in Annex \u201cStatement of Requirement\u201d.
full_summary:
================================ setData ########

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Acquisition of Prefabricated Aluminum Footbridges for Parks Canada
================================================================================================================("");

**Reference Number:** WS3773238237-Doc3863440658

**Publication Date:** 2023-02-08

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-01T14:00:00 EST

**Brief Description:**
This request for proposal (RFP) aims to acquire two prefabricated aluminum footbridges for Parks Canada. The footbridges are to be delivered to Saint-Mathieu-du-Parc, Quebec, Canada, as per the Statement of Requirement in Annex.

- attachments_not_granted 

**Terms and Conditions:**

*   The RFP cancels and supersedes previous RFP number Doc3773267617 dated December 13, 2022, with a closing date of February 8, 2023, at 2 PM EST.
*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to offerors who offered on the previous RFP.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on March 1st, 2023. Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Solicited Goods and Services:**
The solicited goods and services are prefabricated aluminum footbridges, including delivery to the specified location.

**Notice Information:**
*   Notice URL: HTTP://DISCOVERY.ARIBA.COM/RFX/15359688?EXTSITE=MTUzNTk2ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contracting Entity:**
*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
*   Country: Canada

**Contact Information:**
*   François S. Martineau (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  ```
